title: James A Garfield National Historic Site: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit         Start your visit in the Visitor Center, a restored carriage barn built in 1894. NPS Staff  The James A. Garfield National Historic Site is open November - April on Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays from 10am-5pm. From May - October, the site is open daily from 10am-5pm. Guided tours of the Garfield home occur on a scheduled basis throughout the day. Please call ahead for the daily tour schedule. Though times may vary, the last tour of the day is always at 4:15pm.
